initial_reviews.review_title: Amazing integration and fantastic customer service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadfwd?
Over the last ten years, we've successfully utilized the marketing automation platform LeadForward for a variety of purposes, including emails, landing pages, social media post sharing, website analytics, and automation. The online support has consistently been excellent, promptly stepping in to offer assistance, guidance, and resolution whenever needed.

The system seamlessly integrates with several CRM solutions, with Sugar CRM based on my personal experience. Its user-friendly interface has made designing and creating email templates a enjoyable task for me. I also appreciate crafting forms and landing pages, allowing website visitors to submit their details before accessing our highly technical papers.

Witnessing the engagement of our customers and leads with our emails, website, and content is truly remarkable. This insight helps us better understand their needs and tailor our offerings to cater to their specific areas of interest.

What do you dislike about Leadfwd?
Similar to many other marketing automation platforms, LeadForward continues to evolve, introducing new capabilities each year. One feature I would have appreciated is the ability to generate comprehensive reports for each individual with a single click, providing a consolidated view of their journey and interactions with web pages, emails, forms, and more in one Excel sheet.

Recommendations to others considering Leadfwd:
If INBOX25 integrates to your CRM, I would highly recommend it. They still need to make improvements which they are constantly; though a great option if you are just starting with marketing automation and economically sound!

What problems is Leadfwd solving and how is that benefiting you?
At exhibitions and conferences, we encounter individuals who might not be immediately ready to engage and purchase software from us. Through consistent email newsletters, I furnish them with technical information and track their activities over time. Upon detecting a heightened interest in our content and frequent visits to our website, I share their details with the sales team. This proactive approach often results in fruitful connections and new business opportunities.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadfwd?
We love leads! And we like to know where they come from and if they are converting into real business. Inbox25 helps us generate leads using email marketing, automated campaigns and landing pages. Then it helps connect the dots from a campaign, to a lead, contact or account, and ultimately trace it to an opportunity. If you're a Sugar user, Inbox25 has a great integration with the opportunities module that shows you what you're getting from your digital marketing. The Sugar integration just keeps getting better and better.

What do you dislike about Leadfwd?
There's not enough time in a day to do everything I want to do with Inbox25. The only aspect of Inbox25 that is a little confusing is how the counts are generated by the system. However, it's never pre-empted me from doing any desired activity to any list or any type.

Recommendations to others considering Leadfwd:
Think strategically, not tactically, when you evaluate the platform. Some competitors may have a slicker, easier user interface, but don't have the reporting and integration capabilities that allow you to truly evaluate your return on marketing. If you're using SugarCRM, this is the best platform to consider.

What problems is Leadfwd solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our product category isn't growing by leaps and bounds, so we're very focused on using Inbox25 to take market share, generate new customers, and nurture existing customers so they buy more. We also use it to have more frequent communication with our distribution channels (and can see who is engaged and who isn't). We also send all of our press releases to media contacts using Inbox25. It's also a great vehicle for launching and introducing new products and generating sales leads for them. Perhaps the biggest change since we started using Inbox25 is we no longer send out our quarterly newsletter in hard copy. It's entirely sent using Target Lists and Marketing Lists in Inbox25.
